actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 101-810, Part I.
Mr. Anderson moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
The chair announced that a second on the motion to suspend the rules is not required.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Laid on the table. See S. 2540 for further action.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: To authorize the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan, design, construct, and equip space in the East Court of the National Museum of Natural History building, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to enable the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to design, construct, and equip space in the East Court of the National Museum of Natural History building.

titles.title: To authorize the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan, design, construct, and equip space in the East Court of the National Museum of Natural History building, and for other purposes.
